climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Elegant Design: Featuring a timeless striped tufted embroidery design, this boho comforter set effortlessly and stylishly refreshes your interior space with exquisite beauty.

Premium Filling: Featuring Bedsure's thoroughly tested polyester microfiber filling blend, these bedding comforter sets maintain the perfect balance between weight and warmth, creating a cloud-like sleeping space all year round.
Extra Soft: The premium polyester microfiber cover offers exceptional softness. The smooth and breathable fabric provides maximum comfort without any rustling noise, ensuring a restful night's sleep.
Safe: This shabby chic comforter is Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified for meeting the highest testing criteria for harmful chemicals and has been found harmless for humans.

Easy Care: With the premium polyester microfiber fabric and Bedsure's unique dyeing technique, this farmhouse comforter set resists fading, shrinking, and seam slippage after washing. Machine wash separately in cold water on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low.
What You Can Get: This Bedsure queen comforter set includes 1 comforter (90" x 90") and 2 pillowcases (20" x 26").

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a lot of comforters, duvets, blankets in my life, and WOW- this is one amazing comforter. It came vacuumed sealed (appreciate) - and when it arrived it looked kind of flat -scrunched and wasn't sure what was about to unfold. Well, folks this is one incredible set. Included two pillow shams. This mint green is one of my favorite colors- so it was a no brainer when this caught my eye. When I unfolded the comforter- it fell perfectly onto my bed. LIned up evenly and all the what I thought were wrinkles disappeared. So my eyes were definitely pleased with what I saw. The SOFTNESS is UNREAL. It is one of those products, you fall in love with and go buy a back up, because it is everything you love. That GOOD!The fabric is super buttery soft. Yet, lightweight enough to use even in this 100 degree summer weather. Yet, it is warm enough that during the night should the temp drop, you sleep like a dream. Quite honestly, I have been having the best nights sleep, which I attribute to this comforter. The "farmhouse shabby chic" is a lovely style. The cream stitching throughout the comforter is impeccable. No loose strings/threads, very solid constructed blanket. This exceeds my expectations on so many levels. What else is great is that they offer (currently) 11 different color options. Sizes range from TWIN to KING.Dimensions for the KING: 104" x 90"Filling: microfiber fabric - very breathable and extremely comfortable.Machine washable - cold water - tumble dry, so easy upkeep.Based on all these factors and my IMMENSE pleasure in this set, I would highly recommend this to other consumers. It is an absolute joy to own this! Well done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I know this is inexpensive but I love it!
reviews.reviewText: It is just really comfortable. Prettier than my expensive down comforter and keeps me just as warm. I can't explain it but definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this white comforter set on sale on Amazon and choose the "curved" pattern for an extra 10% off putting it at around $24 total. I was concerned if for the price I would recieve not a "shabby-chic" but rather shabby product. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and design and once laundered very pleased. It washed beautifully, no loose threads,bunching or wrinkles. It plumped up nicely and fits queen bed perfectly. I have a dusty purple bedroom that I wanted to brighten up with a light color. The white is a very clean soft white,whiter than in picture but not a bright white which very much compliments the shabby-chic style. It is a lightweight but not "thin" like some budget comforters. It is comfy & warm. Living in SW Florida I was hoping for a little cooler one. Nice for winter but for summer I remove it at night and sleep with a cooling blanket. Also important to me is linens that are oeko-tex certified. Many are not or what I find most disappointing is that MANY advertised products state oeko-tex but no such label on product or package exists when product arrives. This has a legit oeko-tex certified label on product and I verified the number. In summary,a very good, quality product at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This comforter was super soft out of the package. Looks great but material is soft but feels thin the seams are stitched nicely and pillow sham fit great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have been looking for so long!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking so very long for a decent comforter set that matched the aesthetic I have been trying to create for my room. And this thing is absolutely what I’ve wanted!!! I’ve been so sick of the flat same pattern that everyone finds and is just blah on the bed. So I tried this, the stitching pattern is excellent. The color is perfect. Just perfect! It’s more of a soft seafoam blue/green and I just LOVE it! It’s excellent tempature wise. Very soft. Yes it’s microfiber. So not my usual like. But it is actually a really nice one. Hands down my favorite comforter set I’ve gotten!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and pretty.
reviews.reviewText: This will do nicely for spring and summer. Not too heavy in weight and pretty pattern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and so light
reviews.reviewText: This comforter is perfect for our guest room! The color is great, it is light, and super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice, but…
reviews.reviewText: The quality and texture of the bedding is so nice, but the downside is that the comforter barely reaches the sides of the bed. I wish I had read the reviews regarding this issue because I probably wouldn’t have ordered it because this is one of my biggest pet peeves. Nice color and easy to wash otherwise.
